classes.description: Transaction of money from backaccount to another.

properties.name: amountRange
properties.description: Range of amount of money of the transaction.

properties.name: buyer
properties.description: Owner of the bankaccount where the money is transacted from.

properties.name: seller
properties.description: Owner of the bankaccount where the money is transacted to.

properties.name: location
properties.description: City where the money transaction originates.
